findings.title: Improper error handling
findings.description: Across the codebase, appropriate arithmetic calculations do not lead to vulnerability but they revert to unexpected values, so if a transaction is reverted due to invalid, the user will not know the reason for the failure.

findings.title: Tokens can be minted or burned even if contract is paused
findings.description: Most token functionality is restricted when the contract is paused, however there is no restriction on mint and burn functions.

findings.title: Lack of unit tests
findings.description: The code lacks unit tests, which is a concern for contracts handling thousands of user funds and should have appropriate testing and coverage.
